name: places/ChIJ05J-fltZwokRb6Dro6E9A9k
formattedAddress: 287 Park Ave S, New York, NY 10010, USA
adrFormatAddress: 287 Park Ave S, New York, NY 10010, USA

originalText.text:
When I first went there, everything was on point. Food, atmosphere, service. *chefs kiss*

I bragged about this place to all my coworkers and friends and promised to take them when our schedules allowed. I was so excited when today, my schedule allowed me to swing by and pick up the Tartufo Nero. I tried it the first time I went and it was so delicious that I couldn’t wait to go back and get another pie…

But my experience this time around was the complete OPPOSITE of my first visit. One woman alone was manning the front of the store…she was making food, bussing tables and taking orders from people coming in. DURING LUNCH HOUR.

She was very overwhelmed and I could forgive that because even though she was VERY overworked, she still managed to keep a positive attitude. Props to her. Not happy about the wait but it’s understandable considering her predicament.

What makes me give a lower rating is the food! Like night and day. The first pizza I tried was delicious and dressed to perfection. This one I tried today was naked and burnt. Yikes.

Three stars because I remember what was and I’m staying hopeful…fingers crossed that they will improve with more staff.

But this last pizza broke the spell for me. I won’t be going back. I’ve never felt more betrayed…I attached pictures and I think you can agree that it was a huge step down in quality. You almost can’t believe it comes from the same place.

originalText.text: During my break from work, I went to the Serafina restaurant in the NYarea and ordered avocado toast. Wow, I was positively surprised at the combination of ingredients and flavors that greeted me. For starters, it had a tasty jalapeno cream cheese and seeds that made it healthy to consume. Also, I liked the chili flakes, which were a nice and stronger addition. For some, the taste may be a bit all over the place, but as a lover of trying out multiple things at once, I really enjoyed it. I give it a high grade, so you should definitely check it out.

text.text: During my break from work, I went to the Serafina restaurant in the NYarea and ordered avocado toast. Wow, I was positively surprised at the combination of ingredients and flavors that greeted me. For starters, it had a tasty jalapeno cream cheese and seeds that made it healthy to consume. Also, I liked the chili flakes, which were a nice and stronger addition. For some, the taste may be a bit all over the place, but as a lover of trying out multiple things at once, I really enjoyed it. I give it a high grade, so you should definitely check it out.

originalText.text: Love coming here for almond croissants but the customer service in the morning can be pretty bad depending on the day. Last week, the croissant I regularly get was unfortunately quite burnt and missing its filling, and even fell apart into half (bottom separated from the top), proving it was not a good piece. Wish the server had less attitude so I could've felt comfortable letting her know about this. Had to throw it away. Disappointing quality and customer experience.

text.text: Love coming here for almond croissants but the customer service in the morning can be pretty bad depending on the day. Last week, the croissant I regularly get was unfortunately quite burnt and missing its filling, and even fell apart into half (bottom separated from the top), proving it was not a good piece. Wish the server had less attitude so I could've felt comfortable letting her know about this. Had to throw it away. Disappointing quality and customer experience.

originalText.text: Overpriced and limited options. My buddy and I stopped here to get try a new place for food. Mostly everything was packed and there were very limited amount of options (with respect to the salads). Honestly, I could have just gone across the street to Morten Williams and gotten something similar for half the price. The place certainly looks cute but it isn't something I'd go out of my way to go to.

originalText.text: Great food! The al dente pasta was cooked so well and delicious. Also loved the crispy potatoes!  Great environment and staff. Can’t wait to come back again.

text.text: Great food! The al dente pasta was cooked so well and delicious. Also loved the crispy potatoes!  Great environment and staff. Can’t wait to come back again.
